# rtx_policy_map (Resource)

Manages QoS policy-map configurations on RTX routers. Policy-maps define actions to take on classified traffic.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The policy-map name. Must start with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens.

### Optional

- `class` (Block List) List of class definitions within this policy-map (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--class))

<a id="nestedblock--class"></a>
### Nested Schema for `class`

Required:

- `name` (String) Class name (references a class-map)

Optional:

- `bandwidth_percent` (Number) Bandwidth percentage allocation (1-100)
- `police_cir` (Number) Committed Information Rate in bps for policing
- `priority` (String) Priority level: 'high', 'normal', or 'low'
- `queue_limit` (Number) Queue depth limit
